snippet: Khader Adnan was stopped a day after his release from prison as he tried to enter the walled Old City of Jerusalem.
abstract: Palestinian man Khader Adnan is arrested and held for questioning after attempting to enter Old City of Jerusalem to attend Al Aqsa Mosque; arrest comes one day after he was released from prison, where he waged successful 55-day hunger strike.
lead_paragraph: Khader Adnan was stopped a day after his release from prison as he tried to enter the walled Old City of Jerusalem.

headline.main: Palestinian Hunger Striker Is Freed, Then Detained Again
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Israel: Ex-Hunger Striker Detained Day After Release
